header.title: The Key to Fine Dining
header.description: ALWAYS FRESH & DELICIOUS - THE BEST OF ITALIAN CUISINE.

aboutUs.description1: Naná is much more than just a restaurant - it is an exquisite journey into the world of Italian cuisine. Located in the heart of Westend in Frankfurt, you will find a warm atmosphere that carefully crafts every detail to enrich your culinary experience.
aboutUs.description2: Indulge all your senses. Our exquisite wine list offers a selection of the best Italian wines, perfectly paired with our exquisite dishes made from the freshest and highest quality ingredients.
aboutUs.description3: Whether you visit us for a romantic dinner, a joyful celebration with friends, or a quiet moment of relaxation - we invite you to enjoy the exquisite flavors of Italy, share heartfelt moments, and create unforgettable memories at Naná.
aboutUs.description4: Our dedicated team is ready to provide you with an unforgettable evening. Let yourself be pampered by our first-class service and enjoy an Italian journey that will keep you coming back to us again and again.

chef.quote: Our culinary philosophy is based on three fundamental pillars: passion, quality, and tradition. We strive every day to create dishes that not only satisfy the palate but also convey our deep respect for ingredients, culinary culture, and the gastronomic experience as a whole. We believe in the power of food to bring people together, to create moments of joy, and to celebrate life. With commitment and dedication, we pursue our mission of offering extraordinary culinary experiences that leave a lasting impression on anyone who walks through the doors of our restaurant. Thank you for choosing to share this passion with us. Enjoy your meal!
chef.name: Salvo Maggiore

footer.logoQuote: "The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others."
